donate.description: Donate button of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

version.description: {0} will be replaced with for example '2.5.0' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated; Version text of the extension/app

tab.button.changelog.description: Changelog button (opens changelog) of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.button.wiki.description: Wiki button (opens wiki) of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.installed.error.description: Error message of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.installed.heading.description: Title of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.installed.link.installApplication.description: Download button (redirects to premid.app) of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.installed.link.troubleshooting.description: Troubleshooting button (redirects to wiki) of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.installed.start.description: {0} will be replaced with 'PreMiD' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated; Button (redirects you to a promotional video) of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.installed.subHeading.description: {0} will be replaced with 'PreMiD' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated; Subtitle of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.updated.changed.description: Title of the 'changes' section of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.fixed.description: Title of the 'fixed' section of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.heading.description: Title of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.new.description: Title of the 'new features' section of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.subHeading.description: {0} will be replaced with 'PreMiD' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated; Subtitle of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.troubleshooting.heading.description: Title of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button

tab.troubleshooting.subHeading.description: Subtitle of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, {0} will be replaced with 'PreMiD' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated

tab.troubleshooting.checks.extensionEnab.description: Check 1 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.internetConne.description: Check 2 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.appConnection.description: Check 3 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.discordConnec.description: Check 4 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.discordStatus.description: Check 5 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a question mark (?) since we can't check this

tab.troubleshooting.checks.presenceToDis.description: Check 6 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.installed.connectToDiscord.description: Information text to tell users to connect to Discord
tab.installed.connectToDiscord.message: PreMiD를 사용하기 위해 Discord 계정을 연동해야 합니다. 아래 버튼만 누르시면 됩니다.

tab.updated.header.description: Header of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.whatsNew.description: Subtitle of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.changeTypes.features.description: Title of the 'features' section of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.changeTypes.fixes.description: Title of the 'fixes' section of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.changeTypes.performance.description: Title of the 'performance' section of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.changeTypes.chores.description: Title of the 'changes' section of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.linkYourDiscordAccount.description: Button to link your Discord account

tab.updated.linkYourDiscordAccountDescri.description: Description of the button to link your Discord account
tab.updated.linkYourDiscordAccountDescri.message: 버전 2.6.0부터, PreMiD가 제대로 작동하려면 연동된 Discord 계정이 필요해요. PreMiD를 계속 사용하려면 Discord 계정과 연동해 주세요.

tab.updated.linkYourDiscordAccountButton.description: Button to link your Discord account

tab.updated.whatsNext.description: Subtitle of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated

tab.updated.whatsNextDescription.description: Description of the subtitle of the tab which opens when PreMiD was updated
tab.updated.whatsNextDescription.message: 새로운 업데이트가 마음에 드셨기를 바랍니다! 피드백이나 제안 사항이 있으시면 언제든지 Discord 서버에 가입하여 알려주세요.

tab.updated.whatsNextJoinDiscordButton.description: Button to join the Discord server

tab.installed.enableActivityStatus.message: "현재 활동을 상태 메시지로 표시해요."를 꼭 켜도록 하세요

tab.installed.activitySettingsPath.description: Path to activity settings ({0} will be replaced with an arrow)
tab.installed.activitySettingsPath.message: 사용자 설정 {0} 활동 설정 {0} 활동 프라이버시

tab.installed.linkDiscordAccountDescript.description: Description of the prompt to link Discord account
tab.installed.linkDiscordAccountDescript.message: 이것은 PreMiD가 현재 활동을 상태 메시지로 표시할 수 있도록 해줍니다.

tab.installed.nextStep.description: Prompt to move to the next step

tab.installed.enableActivityStatusDescri.description: Description of the prompt to enable activity status
tab.installed.enableActivityStatusDescri.message: "현재 활동을 상태 메시지로 표시해요."를 꼭 켜도록 하세요. 그렇지 않으면, 아무도 반짝반짝한 새 상태를 볼 수 없게 돼요.

tab.installed.enableActivityStatusPrompt.message: "현재 활동을 상태 메시지로 표시해요"를 켜 주세요

tab.installed.setupComplete.message: 이제 다 끝났습니다. PreMiD를 사용해 주셔서 기쁩니다. 만약 도움 혹은 질문이 있거나 필요하다면, 저희의 Discord 서버에 가입해 주세요. 만약 저희만큼 PreMiD를 사랑하신다면, 후원해 주시거나, 확장 프로그램을 평가해 주시거나, 친구들과 공유해 주시는 것으로써 저희를 지원하는 것을 고려해 보세요!
